amendment.description: To ensure transparency in Food and Drug Administration user fee agreement negotiations.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2130 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2130 proposed by Senator Burr. (consideration: CR S3492-3495; text: CR S3492) To ensure transparency in Food and Drug Administration user fee agreement negotiations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2130 proposed by Senator Burr.
